languages.text: "Он... самый лучший среди всех придворных слуг". {n}Мейв опускает глаза, но вы успеваете заметить в них испуг.{/n} "Всегда умел смешить знатных господ. Но поначалу шутки Дана были просто задорными шалостями и каламбурами. То были чудесные, почти невозможные времена..."

traits.locale_text: "Он мой... самый лучший друг среди всех придворных слуг". {n}Лидзи опускает глаза, но вы успеваете заметить в них испуг.{/n} "Дан всегда умел смешить знатных господ. И иногда тайком развлекал слуг, за что ему сильно доставалось. Но поначалу его шутки были просто задорными шалостями и каламбурами. Стоило о них вспомнить — и внутри тотчас зажигалось свое маленькое солнце. И голод как будто бы отступал, и руки не так саднили от работы. То были чудесные, почти невозможные времена..."

languages.text: "He is... the best among all the court servants." {n}Maive looks down, but you catch the fear in her eyes.{/n} "He always knew how to make the noble lords laugh. But at first, Daen's jokes were just funny pranks and puns. Those were wonderful, almost impossible times..."
languages.original_text: "Он... самый лучший среди всех придворных слуг". {n}Мейв опускает глаза, но вы успеваете заметить в них испуг.{/n} "Всегда умел смешить знатных господ. Но поначалу шутки Дана были просто задорными шалостями и каламбурами. То были чудесные, почти невозможные времена..."

traits.locale_text: "He is... the best among all the court servants." {n}Maive looks down, but you catch the fear in her eyes.{/n} "He always knew how to make the noble lords laugh. But at first, Dan's jokes were just funny pranks and puns. Those were wonderful, almost impossible times..."

"He is... the best among all the court servants." {n}Maive looks down, but you catch the fear in her eyes.{/n} "He always knew how to make the noble lords laugh. But at first, Dan's jokes were just funny pranks and puns. Those were wonderful, almost impossible times..."

"He is my... best friend among all the court servants." {n}Lidzy looks down, but you catch the fear in her eyes.{/n} "Dan always knew how to make the noble lords laugh. And sometimes he'd sneak in a few jokes for us servants — he always got in extra trouble for that. But at first, his jokes were just funny pranks and puns. Just thinking of them would make a little sun light up inside me. My gnawing hunger would recede, and my hands wouldn't hurt as much from working. Those were wonderful, almost impossible times..."

"He is... the best among all the court servants." {n}Maive looks down, but you catch the fear in her eyes.{/n} "He always knew how to make the noble lords laugh. But at first, Daen's jokes were just funny pranks and puns. Those were wonderful, almost impossible times..."

"He is... the best among all the court servants." {n}Maive looks down, but you catch the fear in her eyes.{/n} "He always knew how to make the noble lords laugh. But at first, Dan's jokes were just funny pranks and puns. Those were wonderful, almost impossible times..."

"He is... the best among all the court servants." {n}Maive looks down, but you catch the fear in her eyes.{/n} "He always knew how to make the noble lords laugh. But at first, Daen's jokes were just funny pranks and puns. Those were wonderful, almost impossible times..."

languages.text: “他……他是宫廷里最出色的仆人。”{n}梅芙低下了头，但你从她的目光中看到了恐惧之色。{/n}“他总是知道如何把那些贵族逗笑。不过一开始，达恩他仅仅是说些俏皮的双关语，做些有趣的恶作剧而已。那段时光真的很美妙，仿佛根本没存在过……”
languages.original_text: "He is... the best among all the court servants." {n}Maive looks down, but you catch the fear in her eyes.{/n} "He always knew how to make the noble lords laugh. But at first, Daen's jokes were just funny pranks and puns. Those were wonderful, almost impossible times..."

traits.locale_text: “他……他是宫廷里最出色的仆人。”{n}梅芙低下了头，但你从她的目光中看到了恐惧之色。{/n}“他总是知道如何把那些贵族逗笑。不过一开始，达恩他仅仅是说些俏皮的双关语，做些有趣的恶作剧而已。那段时光真的很美妙，仿佛根本没存在过……”
“他……他是宫廷里最出色的仆人。”{n}梅芙低下了头，但你从她的目光中看到了恐惧之色。{/n}“他总是知道如何把那些贵族逗笑。不过一开始，丹他仅仅是说些俏皮的双关语，做些有趣的恶作剧而已。那段时光真的很美妙，仿佛根本没存在过……”

languages.text: «Es... el mejor de todos los siervos de la corte». {n}Maive baja la mirada, pero adviertes el miedo en sus ojos.{/n} «Siempre sabía cómo hacer reír a los señores nobles. Aunque al principio los chistes de Daen no eran más que bromas divertidas y juegos de palabras. Fueron tiempos maravillosos, casi imposibles...».
languages.original_text: "He is... the best among all the court servants." {n}Maive looks down, but you catch the fear in her eyes.{/n} "He always knew how to make the noble lords laugh. But at first, Daen's jokes were just funny pranks and puns. Those were wonderful, almost impossible times..."

Aunque al principio los chistes de Daen no eran más que bromas divertidas y juegos de palabras. Fueron tiempos maravillosos, casi imposibles...».

«Es... el mejor de todos los siervos de la corte». {n}Maive baja la mirada, pero adviertes el miedo en sus ojos.{/n} «Siempre sabía cómo hacer reír a los señores nobles. Aunque al principio los chistes de Dan no eran más que bromas divertidas y juegos de palabras. Fueron tiempos maravillosos, casi imposibles...».

languages.text: "O... Tüm saray hizmetkârlarının en iyisidir." {n}Maive aşağı baksa da gözlerindeki korkuyu yakalıyorsun.{/n} "Asil lordları nasıl güldüreceğini her daim bilirdi. Başta Daen'in şakaları sadece komik muziplikler ve kelime oyunlarından ibaretti. O zamanlar harikaydı, öyle zamanlardı ki..."
languages.original_text: "He is... the best among all the court servants." {n}Maive looks down, but you catch the fear in her eyes.{/n} "He always knew how to make the noble lords laugh. But at first, Daen's jokes were just funny pranks and puns. Those were wonderful, almost impossible times..."

Başta Daen'in şakaları sadece komik muziplikler ve kelime oyunlarından ibaretti. O zamanlar harikaydı, öyle zamanlardı ki..."

languages.text: 「彼は、宮廷の使用人の中で一番ですわ」{n}メイヴは顔を下に向けるが、彼女の目の中に恐怖を読み取る。{/n}「彼はいつも貴族を笑わせる方法を知っていました。しかし、最初はダンの冗談が面白い悪戯と駄洒落だっただけなのです。それは素晴らしく、ほとんど不可能な…」
languages.original_text: "He is... the best among all the court servants." {n}Maive looks down, but you catch the fear in her eyes.{/n} "He always knew how to make the noble lords laugh. But at first, Daen's jokes were just funny pranks and puns. Those were wonderful, almost impossible times..."

「彼は、宮廷の使用人の中で一番ですわ」{n}メイヴは顔を下に向けるが、彼女の目の中に恐怖を読み取る。{/n}「彼はいつも貴族を笑わせる方法を知っていました。しかし、最初はダンの冗談が面白い悪戯と駄洒落だっただけなのです。それは素晴らしく、ほとんど不可能な…」

languages.text: « C'est... le meilleur serviteur de la cour. » {n}Maive baisse le regard, mais vous décelez une note de peur dans ses yeux.{/n} « Il a toujours le bon mot pour faire rire les seigneurs. Au début, les plaisanteries de Daen se limitaient à des farces et des jeux de mots amusants. Mais c'était une autre époque... »
languages.original_text: "He is... the best among all the court servants." {n}Maive looks down, but you catch the fear in her eyes.{/n} "He always knew how to make the noble lords laugh. But at first, Daen's jokes were just funny pranks and puns. Those were wonderful, almost impossible times..."

Au début, les plaisanteries de Daen se limitaient à des farces et des jeux de mots amusants. Mais c'était une autre époque... »

« C'est... le meilleur serviteur de la cour. » {n}Maive baisse le regard, mais vous décelez une note de peur dans ses yeux.{/n} « Il a toujours le bon mot pour faire rire les seigneurs. Au début, les plaisanteries de Dan se limitaient à des farces et des jeux de mots amusants. Mais c'était une autre époque... »

languages.text: "Er ist ... der beste aller Hofdiener." {n}Maive senkt ihren Blick, aber du bemerkst die Angst in ihren Augen.{/n} "Er wusste immer, wie man die adeligen Lords zum Lachen bringen kann. Aber anfangs waren Daens Witze nur lustige Streiche und Wortspiele. Das waren wunderbare, fast unmögliche Zeiten ..."
languages.original_text: "He is... the best among all the court servants." {n}Maive looks down, but you catch the fear in her eyes.{/n} "He always knew how to make the noble lords laugh. But at first, Daen's jokes were just funny pranks and puns. Those were wonderful, almost impossible times..."

Aber anfangs waren Daens Witze nur lustige Streiche und Wortspiele. Das waren wunderbare, fast unmögliche Zeiten ..."

Aber anfangs waren Dans Witze nur lustige Streiche und Wortspiele. Das waren wunderbare, fast unmögliche Zeiten ..."
